item.title: Assignment 04 - Using ShinyApp
item.description: Assignment 4 - Using ShinyApp This assignment involved creating an interactive post with ShinyApp. Homeruns per Team The following chart shows the amount of homeruns per team in each year. The Top 5 Teams are highlighted.
